metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11373 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read in File__Analyze::Get_L8 in File__Analyze_Buffer.cpp in MediaInfoLib in MediaArea MediaInfo 18.12 leads to a crash. It was discovered that MediaInfo contained multiple security issues when handling certain multimedia files. If a user were tricked into opening a crafted multimedia file, an attacker could cause MediaInfo to crash, resulting in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libmediainfo package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '18.12-2').
